page.title: 19Marianne's Tuesday
page.content: Dad woke me at 7 o'clock and after my wash Idressed and made my bed and went down for breakfast.After breakfast I got my things and went to{School.} I changed my library book and played in the yard until{Assembly}at nine. We did a{Scripture}lesson and then a {Mental Arithmetic}test,{Maths}and some work on the{Computer.} After break we did a{Comprehension}and some{Reading}and then got ready for lunch,which today was soup,sandwiches and shortcake. In the afternoon we went to{Garstang {pool}for{Swimming,}and when I got back I did{Weather Observations.}We then did some{Singing,}listened to a{Story} and said prayers before going home. Before tea I went to Garstang with Dad and watched some{T.V.} After tea I went to{Brownies}and came home for supper,a bath and then bed.
